original: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du brgyad lhag pa'i stong bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du brgyad lhag pa'i stong bzlas par bya'o //

original: de nas rdzogs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bltas pas gang 'dod pa de'i mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rdzogs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bltas pas gang 'dod pa de'i mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, when it is complete, one should look at the Blessed Noble Tārā, and one will obtain whatever is desired.

original: aom ma ni t'a re h'um 'bum bzlas nas 'phags ma'i drung du nye bar gnas na gang 'dod pa de thams cad ster bar byed do //
analyzed: aom ma ni t'a re h'um 'bum bzlas nas 'phags ma'i drung du nye bar gnas na gang 'dod pa de thams cad ster bar byed do //
translated: Having recited the one hundred thousand [times] of Oṃ maṇi tāre hūṃ, if one remains in the presence of the Noble Lady, she will grant whatever is desired.

original: dkyil 'khor med kyang khrus byas te nye bar gnas nas bzlas pa 'ba' zhig tsam gyis 'grub ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor med kyang khrus byas te nye bar gnas nas bzlas pa 'ba' zhig tsam gyis 'grub ste /
translated: Even without a maṇḍala, if one remains in the presence of the Noble Lady after bathing, one will accomplish [her] merely by recitation.

original: bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do //

original: 'od dpag med kyi snying po'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa gsungs pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'od dpag med kyi snying po'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa gsungs pa rdzogs so /
translated: The chapter of the Blessed Noble Tārā from the Amitāyus Essence Tantra is complete.
